Yeah...me too!

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: threadsintyme@juno.=
com 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, April 12, 2009 6:27 AM
=
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing





  You are right April, bu=
t this will take a lot of time and effort. Sounds like a great experiment t=
o me!
  Al
  ---------- Original Message ----------
  From: "April Abercrom=
bie" <april@...>
  To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
 =
 Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing
  Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 19:32:=
46 -0600




  It would have to present consistent results first. Then I wo=
uld trust it...to a point. I could never be 100% sure and that is fine by m=
e.

  So in the end, it really doesn't matter. I would be happy just knowin=
g that I have proven to myself that I am conversing with a sentient being.
=

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: lori bogren 
    To: evp-itc@y=
ahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, April 11, 2009 6:03 PM
    Subject: RE:=
 [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing


    April~
     
    So my next question w=
ould be, how do you know it wouldn't be "prankster".  Providing accurate in=
formation until a personal question about itself was asked and then mislead=
?
     
    ~Lori
    PS:  Did I tell you there's a running joke amongst my=
 friends about my paranoia?  :)




    "My life is boring, my fantasies ar=
e a theme park." 
    --Anne Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just di=
d not get it. 



      




----------------------------------------------=
------------------------------
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
    From: ap=
ril@...
    Date: Sat, 11 Apr 2009 16:55:22 -0600
=
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing





    I would try it both=
 ways -solo and with another person. However I would limit it to just me an=
d one other trustworthy person.


    "How would you go about determining/v=
erified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in between life and the other s=
ide), a spirit (someone that's crossed over and came back to say high) and =
some other type of entity?"

    Only after establishing that I am indeed c=
ommunicating with a spirit, and that spirit has given me trustworthy info c=
onsistently, at that point I would simply ask what it's nature is.

    Apr=
il

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: lori bogren 
      To: =
evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, April 11, 2009 2:48 PM
     =
 Subject: [EVP-ITC] Oujia Board Testing


      April~
       
      Are yo=
u planning on doing this solo or working with a team?
       
      How wou=
ld you go about determining/verified whether it's a ghost (someone stuck in=
 between life and the other side), a spirit (someone that's crossed over an=
d came back to say high) and some other type of entity?
       
      ~Lori=





      "My life is boring, my fantasies are a theme park." 
      --Ann=
e Rice  Responding to an interviewer who just did not get it. 



        
=




-----------------------------------------------------------------------=
---
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
      From: april@abercrombieghostres=
earch.com
      Date: Fri, 10 Apr 2009 22:37:13 -0600
      Subject: Re: [E=
VP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.





      Well, if=
 my husband would let me actually experiment with one, that would be the fi=
rst step LOL!

      But what I would try and do is get some kind of verifi=
able information from the "entity" that I contact with the board to prove t=
hat it is communication from an actual, intelligent being and not just my o=
wn motor responses making he planchette move. It would have to be informati=
on that I have no knowledge of.

      If I could do that, and consistently=
, then I would be comfortable saying that I am actually talking to a spirit=
.

      The reason I have my doubts is that you have to be touching the pl=
anchette to get it to move. If it were an actual spirit, I would think that=
 shouldn't be necessary. We all know ghosts can a do move objects.

      B=
ut this brings up another mystery - if the Ouija board is actual spirit com=
munication, maybe there is a difference between the entities you can contac=
t with it and your common ghost.

      April

        ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
        From: lori bogren 
        To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
 =
       Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 9:50 PM
        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] =
An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.


        April~
         
=
        Hm, finally I'm intrigued again.
         
        How do you about=
 the process?
         
        ~Lori




        "My life is boring, my fa=
ntasies are a theme park." 
        --Anne Rice  Responding to an interview=
er who just did not get it. 



          




----------------------------=
--------------------------------------------
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com
        From: april@...
        Date: Fri, 1=
0 Apr 2009 18:36:30 -0600
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to =
the usual ghost hunter stuff.


        .


        When it comes to the Ou=
ija, I just want to study it to find out if it is really spirit communicati=
on, or just kinetic energy or your subconscious mind moving the planchette.=


        I agree that we all have the ability for extra sensory perception=
, just some are better at it than others. Like running, for instance. We al=
l can run, but some are naturally better at it. Still, with practice we can=
 get better.

        But that is not my aim with the Ouija.


          --=
--- Original Message ----- 
          From: lori bogren 
          To: evp-=
itc@yahoogroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 6:11 PM
       =
   Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.

=

          April~
           
          You forgot yawn from boredom, that'=
s what I do.
           
          Use it, don't use it.  I don't care.  Bu=
t why bother.  When people ask me I usually suggest that if they want to co=
mmunicate with ... whatever why not develop the ability yourself.  - ya, I'=
m one of those who believe anyone can.
           
          There's always=
 the question in the back of your mind whether your partner's moving it.  T=
he intentions of "what" you are talking to.  Not to mention it's too slow a=
nd limited.
           
          Besides if you take the time to develop t=
he ability you can get more texture in the information.  Asking the board "=
where you married?" may get you a "yes" but a psychic might get the sense o=
f a religious or civil ceremonhy, the garment(s) worn, other's in the party=
, or whether that Being approved/disapproved of their spouse (ie was it a r=
eluctant union).
           
          ~Lori
